Key Match Events: Shubman Gill scored an unbeaten 126 runs
Indian pacers reduced New Zealand to 21/5 in 4.3 overs
New Zealand folded for just 66 runs in 12.1 overs
Hardik Pandya scalped four wickets for 16 runs
Arshdeep Singh, Shivam Mavi, and Umran Malik picked two wickets each
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill's innings took New Zealand out of the attack with the innings
The credit has to be given to Rahul Tripathi as well, who started off the counter-attack in the powerplay
Suryakumar Yadav played yet another small cameo
Captain Hardik Pandya hit 30 off 17 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: India remained unbeaten in 2023 after defeating New Zealand in the decider of the three-match series
The game looked done halfway through, as it was fairly unlikely that Mitchell Santner's men were going to chase a target this big
